servicesSection.service1Title: Competitive Price and No Hidden Fees
servicesSection.service1Text: Enjoy transparent and advantageous rates, lower than our competitors. Your price is set in advance: no unexpected surcharges, no hidden fees, only reliable and affordable service.
servicesSection.service2Text: Travel in a top-of-the-line vehicle, perfectly maintained, for a pleasant and serene experience. Enjoy personalized attention, bottled water, phone charger and music of your choice, for an enjoyable and tailor-made journey.
servicesSection.service3Title: Free Cancellation (up to 10 hours in advance)
servicesSection.service3Text: Plan your journeys with complete peace of mind: you can cancel for free up to 10 hours before your departure. Flexibility and simplicity are at the heart of our service, to offer you maximum peace of mind.

aboutPage.title: ABOUT ME
aboutPage.intro1:
Your simple and reliable solution for all your trips to Lisbon.
Our mission is clear: to make your journeys pleasant, safe and stress-free.
aboutPage.intro2: We created this service with one idea in mind: to offer quality private transport accessible to all. Whether it's for a daily commute, a business meeting, a transfer to a train station or airport, we adapt to your needs.
aboutPage.intro3: With transparent rates, attentive drivers and easy bookings, we do everything to offer you a practical and warm service.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.card1Text: Corresponds to a simple and direct journey. Example: from the airport to the hotel, or from home to a train station. It's fast, convenient and economical. The customer books, the driver drives to the intended destination.
servicesPage.card2Title: Availability by the hour or half-day
servicesPage.card2Text: This service is for those who need a flexible private driver available for a defined duration. Rather than booking trip by trip, you benefit from a vehicle and driver just for you, by the hour or half-day.
servicesPage.card3Text: Travel between cities or regions with optimal comfort and competitive prices. Book easily via Whatsapp.
servicesPage.step1Text: Book your ride on the website.
servicesPage.step2Text: Send a Whatsapp message to the driver. Receive confirmation from the driver.
servicesPage.step3Text: Payment of 15% of the ride to reserve the slot.
servicesPage.step4Text: Wait for your driver, he will inform you of his arrival time.
servicesPage.step5Text: Secure payment and ability to leave a review.
servicesPage.mapPopupText: Service area: Lisbon (including airport), Seixal, Barreiro, Cascais and Sintra

reviewsPage.title: Client Reviews
reviewsPage.subtitle: Discover the testimonials of our satisfied customers
reviewsPage.review1Text: "Impeccable service! Stephan arrived right on time for my transfer to the airport. Clean and comfortable vehicle, very professional driving. I highly recommend for all your travels in Lisbon."
reviewsPage.review2Text: "Great driver! Very friendly and gave good advice about places to visit. The car was air-conditioned and very pleasant. Fair price compared to competitors. Small 10 minute wait at departure but nothing serious."
reviewsPage.review3Text: "I called on Stephan for a wedding. Top-notch service! Luxury vehicle, formally dressed driver, very punctual. Nothing to complain about, everything was perfect. I'm keeping his contact for my next stays."
reviewsPage.review4Text: "Very easy booking, transparent price communicated in advance. Stephan is very professional, smooth and safe driving. Complimentary water bottle and music of your choice. A truly premium service!"
reviewsPage.review5Text: "Perfect for business transfers! Stephan knows Lisbon and its surroundings perfectly. Always on time, impeccable vehicle. I was able to work quietly during the trip thanks to WiFi. Service I highly recommend."
reviewsPage.review6Text: "Decent service overall. I had a last-minute problem with my delayed flight and Stephan was understanding. However, I found the vehicle a bit less comfortable than expected and the music was a bit loud. Reasonable price."
reviewsPage.review7Text: "Family trip with 2 children. Stephan was very attentive, car seats provided, trip adapted for children. Very patient and caring. Very honest price for this quality of service. We'll be back!"
reviewsPage.review8Text: "Good service overall! Easy booking, quick confirmation, professional and courteous driver. The vehicle was clean but not as luxurious as the photos. Fair value for money in Lisbon."
